attributes.action: Give tax breaks to key workers
attributes.additional_details:
Key workers have put themselves, and their loved ones, at risk of contracting COVID-19 for the benefit of the country. 

This includes NHS staff, carers, delivery drivers, supermarket workers and many more besides. 

It is only right that their commitment to keeping Britain going throughout this crisis is rewarded in a tangible way that compensates them for their hard work and demonstrates that both the Government and the British public are grateful to them.
attributes.background: Provide tax breaks to those who have continued to work on relatively low incomes throughout the COVID-19 pandemic and Government instructed shutdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
